Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians and Tampa Bay Rays will play on Saturday at Progressive Field, at 6:10 p.m. ET, with Jose Ramirez and Yandy Diaz -- two hot hitters -- expected to step up at the plate.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rays are +119 moneyline underdogs for this matchup against the favored Guardians (-140). Cleveland is favored on the run line (-1.5 with +152 odds). The total for the matchup is set at 8 runs.
